/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene below. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked along the sides of the road, hinting at the bustling life of the city. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, encapsulating the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes the city.
